title: In Between
overview: The drama tells the story of young people in modern urban life who, in their search for love and self-discovery, are unafraid of setbacks and failures, ultimately achieving different kinds of growth. He Zhi Nan seeks love, while Han Su seeks a livelihood. The collision between emotion and reason creates a unique twist in the plot. Qu Yi Peng is focused on making a living, while Gao Peng is a wealthy second-generation character who bravely pursues self-discovery. Gao Peng has money but also hopes to gain the superpower of shouldering life's responsibilities.
